title: Newton's Method With $$n=1$$
text: To find $$x_1$$, use the equation $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$ with $$n=1$$ and $$x_0=0$$.
